amendment.description: To grant the children of Filipino World War II veterans special immigrant status for purposes of family reunification.

action.text: Amendment agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 4029 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S4747-4750: text: CR S4747) To grant the children of Filipino World War II veterans special immigrant status for purposes of family reunification.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4029 proposed by Senator Akaka.
